english.segment1: I have unanswered prayers. I have trouble I wish wasnÂ’t there. And I have asked a thousand ways. That you would take my pain away. You would take my pain away
english.segment2: I am trying to understand. How to walk this weary land. Make straight the paths that crooked lie. Oh Lord, before these feet of mine. Oh Lord, before these feet of mine
english.segment3: When my world is shaking, heaven stands. When my heart is breaking. I never leave your hands
english.segment4: When you walked upon the earth. You healed the broken, lost and hurt. I know you hate to see me cry. One day you will set all things right. Yeah, one day you will set all things right
english.segment5: When my world is shaking, heaven stands. When my heart is breaking. I never leave your hands
english.segment6: Your hands that shaped the world. Are holding me. They hold me still.
